Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
================

### Invitation to Submit Expression of Interest (EOI) for Leased Office Space

The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites interested parties to submit an Expression of Interest (EOI) for a potential lease of office space that meets the requirements outlined below.

**Background and Requirements**
-----------------------------

The PSPC is seeking a leased office space that meets the following criteria:

*   **Lease Term:** Approximately 10 years, commencing on or about October 1, 2025, with an option to extend for one (1) additional period of three (3) years.
*   **Floor Area:** Approximately 171 usable square meters (um2) of contiguous office space and 1630 um2 of contiguous warehouse space.
*   **Supporting Facilities:**
    *   Available parking for approximately three (3) vehicles within a one (1) block radius of the proposed space.
    *   Adjacent compound space of approximately 6,300 um2 with no obstacles.
    *   A separate pedestrian door next to each overhead door.

**Security and Compliance**
---------------------------

The PSPC must ensure that the proposed space meets all the requirements contained in the document "Standards for Leased Accommodation" and complies with the Public Service and Procurement Canada Act.

**Inspection and Evaluation**
---------------------------

The PSPC reserves the right to visit or inspect the proposed space upon reasonable notice and may conduct a threat and risk assessment to evaluate potential threats to the security of the proposed space and to the public.

**Contact Information**
-------------------

For more information, please contact:

*   Sheena Collins
*   Email: <sheena.collins@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*   Phone: 780-907-4786

### Documents and Further Information

To view the EOI document and further information, please visit the Canada Buys website at <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/03/98d2e0c1c6098280f1f483e47d18f24b/20221013_-_eoi_ad_-_en_-_81002445.pdf> for English and <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/03/57d17ba87d009d14642600b89b2e05fc/20221013_-_eoi_ad_-_fr_-_81002445.pdf> for French.
